text: Bohdan Butenko (8 February 1931 – 14 October 2019) was a Polish cartoonist, illustrator, comic book writer and artist, as well as puppet designer.Butenko Abiit, non Obiit – Joanna Domańska, Przekrój He was born in Bydgoszcz, Poland. His known works include the comic series Kwapiszon, Gapiszon cartoons, as well as Gucio i Cezar comics (written by Krystyna Boglar). He published his cartoons in numerous children's magazines, such as Płomyk, Płomyczek, Miś, Świerszczyk, as well as the magazines Szpilki and Przekrój, and illustrated many children's books.Bohdan Butenko - Życie i twórczość. Culture.pl Butenko died in Warsaw on 14 October 2019 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cartoonists Category:Illustrators Category:Polish writers Category:Comics artists
title: Bohdan Butenko
